website_summaries.verdict: A superb countertop microwave oven for small apartments and large homes alike.
pros: Includes settings for pizza, popcorn, steamed vegetables, and more
Black microwave features a dazzling black exterior that is sure to grab your attention
Equipped with a BPA-free rotary glass cooking plate
Provides an easy-to-read LED display screen
cons: Designed for AC power use only
Glass plate tends to get very hot
May make grinding and rubbing noises when the microwave is in use

customer_reviews.title: Screeching after two months
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for a couple months. All was OK until today. When it was used, there was a loud screech coming from the turntable. Only used a couple times a day for a couple months. Doubt I'll be able to use it anymore. The noise is awful. I need to update my comments. The defective unit was replaced. No problems with the new microwave. This supplier has excellent follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Darma K. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Very upset for the price & it stopped working after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after 3 days. Now I have to be repack the heavy microwave and wait for refund then buy another. I’m a student on budget so yes I need the refund to buy another. Exchanging it not easy as it seems :(
customer_reviews.author: Revolving Love

customer_reviews.title: Immediate Issues that can not be resolved
customer_reviews.text: The light stopped working the third time I used it! After a week the microwave began producing an intermittent sound when running. I contacted the service group and found out the light is only replaceable at the factory. I am required to make a video of the microwave making the sound and send it to the company so they can determine how to address the problem. Very disappointed with the quality of the unit and the company in addressing issues with a new product. I was mislead by the high rating of the company and the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Crouse, B.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the worst microwave I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This is cheaply made and doesn’t cook consistently. Our first attempt to make popcorn using their button for popcorn resulted in a bag of melted goo, all burnt and stuck together. We tried a different brand and the same thing happened. Needless to say, the microwave also still smells like burnt popcorn no matter how many times I clean it. It’s popped bags of veggies so that they didn’t cook properly. I thought this would be a good buy because we don’t really use the microwave that much. But it can’t even handle the smallest tasks. It’s now headed for the trash heap since it’s past the timeline to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Koch

customer_reviews.title: Worst microwave I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: It gets one star because it is indeed a microwave. It was the size I needed so I thought I’d risk it. Big mistake. This think is loud, came with the buttons already starting to peel, and smoked when I used it. It also burnt everything. I’m a popcorn fan and have never used a microwave more crappy. At one minute I have a bunch of leftover kernels. At 1:05 it’s burnt and stinking. I highly recommend NOT getting this microwave.
customer_reviews.author: kmb07

customer_reviews.title: So far, very good!
customer_reviews.text: OK - Initial impression. Excellent. After reading the instructions, I like the way the unit is operated, and the sensor operation works very well. Looks good and was very reasonably priced. Only slight complaint, I had to "learn" the location of the controls since it is located in a dark corner of my countertop and the touch panel is hard to read there. This unit is replacing my Sharp microwave that died (the touch panel gave up the ghost) after 20+ years. Remains to be seen if it has legs like that! I'll wait at least a year then give it a usage review.
customer_reviews.author: nemo's dogs

customer_reviews.title: I bought one of these microwaves based on it being ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these microwaves based on it being the size I needed, cost, its features well exceeding my needs, and customer reviews. Well, after one week the interior light stopped working and the turntable made a grinding sound when in operation. I contacted customer service and after submitting a video of the problems they unhesitatingly replaced the unit. Now THAT is what I call customer service and standing behind their product. I have now had the replacement microwave in service for about three weeks and it functions perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Strnad

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Cheap. - Heats things. - Not too large. - Door opens easily. No annoying latch; just pull on it. This is nice for one-handed operation. Cons: - Diffusion is terrible. Any food likely to spatter or explode *will* spatter or explode in this thing. There's an intense hot spot toward the rear left of the interior. You can hear the sizzling every time something rotates under that spot. - Front panel buttons are ridiculously difficult to operate. How much money was saved employing a keypad with tiny buttons that must be pressed very hard to actuate? I would have paid the extra dollar. Two stars off for this.
customer_reviews.author: antibozo

customer_reviews.title: Turns out it's a great unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was not sure how well this microwave would work since it was priced much lower then other ones. But my daughter needed one for her small apartment so I thought I would surprise her with this. Turns out it's a great unit for the price! It has plenty of room inside even though it's a small microwave, many options including pre-set buttons, defrost and her favorite button of all which is a must have 'popcorn', and she likes the style too which is definetly a plus. I'm glad I decided on this model for her.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase; spotty heating.
customer_reviews.text: First time in my decade+plus of being an Amazon customer that I've felt compelled to leave a review: this product is horribly inefficient. Spotty heating all around---purchased as it was highly rated but it's essentially useless for its purpose as I can't heat up anything without it being scorched in some spots, cold in others, and exploded every time. Assumed it was hard to go wrong when purchasing a microwave; how wrong I was.
customer_reviews.author: kdd2012

customer_reviews.title: I really like this microwave
customer_reviews.text: I really like this microwave. I didn't pay much attention to the dimensions, so it ended up being larger than I expected! It is pretty powerful. It cooks things much faster than our old microwave did. I also find the numerous buttons/settings very helpful. The microwave looks very modern and fits well with the stainless steel appliances in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Strong Momma

customer_reviews.title: Nice Microwave for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I like the quick buttons for 30 second, 1, 2 and 3 minutes. I have used the popcorn and frozen entrees with success and even thawing out frozen meats has worked pretty well. I would have liked to see a button just for warm and you can put the other timed buttons for the amount of time to warm. When I open up the door, the unit is so light that it moves the whole unit forward and I have to keep pushing it back. The lightness is great for setup, as most are quite a bit heavier. I am still learning all the buttons, as I don't use the micro-wave as much as most people do I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Pass if your smart.
customer_reviews.text: Where to start? This microwave feels a bit rickety in the handle. The push buttons aren't easy. I end up pushing 3-5 times to get it to start with the 30 sec feature to work. Can Not (underline that) pop a popcorn bag with out burning it! You have to stand there and watch over it. The bag is still mostly empty when the middle starts to burn. Pretty much hate, Hate HATE this microwave!!! Might just video myself dropping it off my roof and uploading that to get my point across because you cant pass along the smell of burnt popcorn in a review. Buy a different one if your smart.
customer_reviews.author: LCK

customer_reviews.title: Been using this microwave for 4 months and no issues ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this microwave for 4 months and no issues so far. Cooks food very well and is the right size for my counter. Only complaint is the plug sticks out from the outlet making is very hard to plug in behind itself or another appliance. I thought the plug would be a flat plug that would drop down or sideways. I bought an outlet adapter which allows me to plug in sideways to avoid this nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Microwave!!
customer_reviews.text: So I've had the same microwave sine my friend and I bought it at a garage sale in 2004. It was old, didn't have a plate and took forever to warm up. When I received this microwave, I was in microwave Heaven! It warms things up so quick, like seconds sometimes (depending on the item). We don't eat meat, so I can't say on how it heats that up. It looks great too, very nice for the price. Easy to clean with several settings that are just a click of a button. I really like this microwave and glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Met all expectations, considering the good price point.
customer_reviews.text: The unit is about 3/4 size of our old Kenmore/sears that finally bit the dust. Touch key membrane could be a little more sensitive. I need to get some non-skid feet to keep it steady on the cabinet top when operating the controls or opening the door with one hand. Rotary glass tray could use some better outrigger bearings.
customer_reviews.author: CCW

customer_reviews.title: Definite step up the microwave ladder!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it that long. The last microwave bit the dust after 5-6 years of heating frozen dinners and cavemen frozen in what used to be Arctic ice. This one is BETTER! To be a little like Goldilocks, it's not too big, not too small, but just right. And it's even more powerful, so heating goes faster, and that gives me extra time to do, well, more stuff like writing this positive review! I can't speak from experience yet, but it also feels more durable than my last unit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Janover

customer_reviews.title: Good microwave, runs well and nice size/design
customer_reviews.text: Good microwave, runs well and nice size/design. Only little issue is the start and stop button are small and a little hard to hit the right spot.
customer_reviews.author: J M G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service and made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Having gone through two cheap microwaves in two years (one of which I repaired, only to have it fail again 6 months later), we wanted something with a warranty this time. This model not only included a warranty, it has excellent customer service (if you ever need them), and is made in the US! Delivered on time, in one piece, and we had popcorn within a few minutes of unboxing it.
customer_reviews.author: Woodstomper

customer_reviews.title: Very short life spam
customer_reviews.text: This microwave lasted 4 months. On a side note, this has been the 2nd time I have had this accident happen. IT was not the same microwave brand, but maybe buying microwaves through Amazon is not a good idea
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: This is a great microwave at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great microwave at a great price. It is sleek and actually pretty light and fits great on my counter. Its not too tall so it fits under my cabinet. It has all the food settings we tend to use and all work great. Ive never ordered an appliance on amazon before and this was a great first purchase. I would def purchase this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney M Prudhomme

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but a little chunky in size
customer_reviews.text: Quality item! It's easy to use and seems durable. I believe it will be easy to clean (I haven't used it enough to be certain). Its is VERY heavy and large/chunky however. read the measurements if you are trying to fit it in a specific space! Overall, I'm pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Watkins

customer_reviews.title: It does work!
customer_reviews.text: Actually, the output is 1100 watts and input, 1500 watts. I do have a problem pressing the numbers greater than three. I usually end up using 1 through 3 then the 30 second button to get the right time. Also, sometimes the recipe calls for 800 watt and I don't know how that relates to power levels. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: patcw48

customer_reviews.title: This microwave worked well: priced right, easy to use, great features. Amazing customer support!!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Fast shipping, user friendly microwave with convenient features. We were very pleased with it for the first few years. A few weeks shy of 2 years from when we'd bought it, it started making a buzzing noise and stopped heating. I contacted hOmeLabs--after receiving a copy of my invoice and telling me that model was unavailable, they promptly issued me a full refund! So they also get an A++ for excellent customer service! It was so refreshing to deal with a company that stands behind its products! Highly recommend this company : )
customer_reviews.author: K. Balliet

customer_reviews.title: Love the Amazon reviews so I bought this unit
customer_reviews.text: Love the Amazon reviews so I bought this unit.. Very nice and replaced a 25 year old greasy Whirlpool that still works like new. I'm real sorry to see the demise of America's companies . Whirlpool was the best. Who is H0me? Never heard of them but this is a well built unit.
customer_reviews.author: Wood Rat IV

customer_reviews.title: ... had it for a month now and it works great. Easy to open with the handle
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a month now and it works great. Easy to open with the handle, and LOVE that the beeping stops as soon as you open the door. Most microwaves complete their beeping even after you take your food out. This one does not. Thank goodness!
customer_reviews.author: Simrplyain

customer_reviews.title: Great full sized microwave
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good microwave. I like the easy open door. I replaced it with another microwave and I’m surprised at how quickly it heats my food. It’s easy to use and set up. Also it’s not too loud. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris H

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great microwave! I was still using my college microwave 10 years later. This is a great upgrade. I love all of the presets. I eat a lot of baked potatoes and it's so nice to just push a button and have the microwave cook the potato perfectly every time. Food warms up quickly and easily. The black is sleek and it looks nice on my counter. No complaints at all!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this microwave for a few weeks now and I am quite happy with it. The comments about the buttons being unresponsive are true to an extent but, for me, this is not an issue. (I may have to push it twice...). For the price, it is a great purchase. I would get another one without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: SueD

customer_reviews.title: So far I like it. I wanted a smaller microwave than the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this not quite a month. So far I like it. I wanted a smaller microwave than the one this replaced and this one fits the need. I had also contacted their customer service with some questions before buying this. Was impressed with the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: raz

customer_reviews.title: Microwave seems well made.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, not the easiest to use electronic touch button controls, as they require more effort to push them! If you have vision issues this microwave may not work for you, since the control panel is black in color and not the easiest to read! Let's see how long this microwave will last.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Waited a few months to post a review as I have had multiple problems with the few other new microwaves I have purchased in my life breaking down after minor usage. I consider this a very good buy as this is a quality product that has a good look to it and works as it is supposed to without any flaws. I would recommend this product and it comes at an affordable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Blobaum

customer_reviews.title: Not well designed
customer_reviews.text: The keypad buttons aren't arranged logically. The covering on the stop button is buckling & we've only had it a few months. It cooks very unevenly--heat something large & there are hot & cold spots throughout.
customer_reviews.author: GracieSquare

customer_reviews.title: I had no idea how bad that microwave was until I tried this one
customer_reviews.text: My old microwave was from the 1990's. I had no idea how bad that microwave was until I tried this one. It's pretty big in size & has the turntable inside. I like all the preset settings. Also, the display is quite bright. When I'm up in the night, I don't have to turn on a light. 4 stars because the door seems a little cheap...hard to explain, it it seems like it might not be sturdy, but I haven't had any issues with it so far! I hope this microwave lasts. It looks very nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Kar Star

customer_reviews.title: What you need. Power and Price.
customer_reviews.text: For the power and the price you wont find a better microwave. I've definitely seen better functionality as far as buttons and settings, but never a better end result. Perfectly defrosts, warm, reheats, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Whittaker D.

customer_reviews.title: ... microwave for several months now and it's been working great. The customer service is great -- they offered ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had the microwave for several months now and it's been working great. The customer service is great -- they offered a $20 amazon gift card to register for warranty -- win win! Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ahaque12

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is an excellent Microwave. The one thing I had to get ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is an excellent Microwave. The one thing I had to get used to was the quick time buttons. If you want to type in a specific time, you need to press an extra button first, and then enter the time.
customer_reviews.author: Chad S. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Works, but began making odd noises after 3 days of use.
customer_reviews.text: Received item on time, worked well initially. About 3 days after (limited) use, it began making odd noises. Nothing is loose, just rattling and screeching sporadically. Still works fine. Too complicated to return (packaging not saved) and will live with it since it is in an office. A bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1100 watt -vs- 1050 w....no problem here!
customer_reviews.text: For those of you, like myself, wondering how much difference there will be in cook time of microwave dinners....this may help. Bought this unit to replace my older 1100 watt, the door latch is getting finicky but still works. Did a little comparison test using 2 paper bowls with the same amount and temperature water, heating one in each unit for 1 minute. The hOmeLab at 1050 watts heated the bowl of water 4 degrees F hotter than the 1100. Happy cooking!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Hines

customer_reviews.title: Love this microwave
customer_reviews.text: Love this microwave! Much better than the one I had previously (which was ancient). I’ve had this one now for 6 months and haven’t had a problem with it yet. I would buy this again from this company 👍
customer_reviews.author: Laura Leighliter

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH FOR THE PRICE !!
customer_reviews.text: Used this microwave past 2 years . Its too heavy. Take half of the counter top place. Makes noise while cooking and the door is to hard to pull sometimes.The door open and closed makes loud noise. The microwave control panel film came out within 2 months. Heating food also takes longer time.Feels not worth at all.
customer_reviews.author: Hiral Kamdar

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I had read the reviews and did have some concerns over the negative ones. The microwave that I received, in no way, represented a single one of those negative reviews. The 'buttons' are not quite what I was accustomed to, but function quite nicely. It heats faster than my old one of the same wattage did. Overall, this is a super product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Peters

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from hOme
customer_reviews.text: Another great product from hOme! I have a few of their products, so I felt confident ordering this microwave for my parents' new cabin. It's a nice looking microwave. Looking forward to hearing great reviews from my parents.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: We have not been disappointed. It has been easy to use and operate
customer_reviews.text: We had to replace our microwave and after much deliberation we went with this one. We have not been disappointed. It has been easy to use and operate. It does its job and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice microwave, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this to place in our extension party room to use without having to run into our house to use our main microwave. I love it looks pretty similar to our Kenmore Elite and key functions very similar which is great user-friendly between the two. It heat food as it suppose to do!
customer_reviews.author: Lan Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Won't last you more than a year.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this seeing all the good reviews. but after just a year it's clock just shuts off and resets itself. Not some of the number parts don't light up so you can't really tell the time. And if it's heating something up for more than 30 seconds it blows the fuse. I've had everything else unplugged on that fuse, still does it. Now it's warming only the middle of things, but outer edges will still be cold. It's a mess. Worked well for a year, but junk now.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Towianski

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good microwave for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a good solid appliance, works well for what we use it for which is mostly reheating and thawing. Only thing I wish was available was a braille template. Also a switch to turn the turntable rotation on and off would be nice to save wear and tear on that.
customer_reviews.author: Lizardman

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact it's simple and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact it's simple and efficient; however, sometimes the button is not very sensitive; also the microwave move when I click the button so it will be helpful if some anti-slip feature can be added
customer_reviews.author: Chieh, Yang

customer_reviews.title: Paint Pealing inside after 2 years of normal useage
customer_reviews.text: Have enjoyed this unit unit the paint started bubbling up and peeling off exposing metal and rust. One line of the digital display has gone out too. It still seems to work but I've lost confidence in the product. I am glad to see it is unavailable.
customer_reviews.author: Tazz3L

customer_reviews.title: This was a great addition to our basement bar
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to our basement bar. It is very compact and heats up food quickly and evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Great Product with a really nice design and the front handle to open the microwave is super convenient. Very high frequency so things heat up fast and there's also a bunch of specialized buttons for specific items.
customer_reviews.author: James Destra

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer.
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest, this was pricer than I wanted to spend (or could afford) for a microwave. But I am so glad I did. It's HUGE, which is kind of a downside, but it works so well and is really nice. Happy to have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: SamG

customer_reviews.title: Cooks food fast
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave high wattage. Only downside is the buttons are somewhat annoying to press but jts not that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Buyer "Zac"

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It performs very well but the unit has gotten loose inside or a screw for it makes a vibration noise when active but sound goes away when i hold the side of the unit. Otherwise, this microwave really works fast havent had any issues other than the noise and i dont want to try and unscrew it to find out what it is.
customer_reviews.author: AdaptiveSoul

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 8 mo the
customer_reviews.text: Initially I like the microwave because of the size and the power. However recently it has stopped working and apparently isn’t under any 1-2 manufacturers warranty. The microwave just makes a loud sound, spins as if it is heating up, but seems to take about 5 x longer to heat up than before. The sound is quite loud and because of it, makes the use of the microwave a little scary.
customer_reviews.author: Betty moss

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Simple to use. 1 min. 2 min. 3 min. Feature. Also a 30 second. Feature. The first one we ordered we needed to return due to a noise inside when we used it. Customer service was great. They replaced it at no cost.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Barrientos

customer_reviews.title: Great Microwave at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great company that offers a great product at a reasonable rate. The only thing to be cautious of is the film on the buttons. Those can puncture easily and create air bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Steven John

customer_reviews.title: Too many directions
customer_reviews.text: Door is flimsy and feels like it will break easy. Buttons are slow to respond or needs to be pushed several times. Cook settings are difficult. I miss my Panasonic. I can't recommend this product for anything more than warming coffee if you don't mind running it twice to get it hot
customer_reviews.author: Sidecar50

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Bought this for my work place kitchen so people can heat up their food.
customer_reviews.author: Babyytop

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. It cooks/heats perfectly. The decal on the buttons makes it difficult to figure out where to push. They are not lined up well with the sensors underneath. Once you figure out where to push buttons it’s not bad at all. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Byrne Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Set it up right away. Heats to perfect temperature every time. Popcorn feature pops excellent popcorn every time ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Cassi

customer_reviews.title: Love this microwave!
customer_reviews.text: The EasySet timer makes it very...easy...to operate. It's loaded with features, but you probably won't use much beyond "EasySet and "Cook Time". Easy to clean, powerful and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good microwave. It is very light weight so you do need to hold it with one hand while opening it with the other (unless you store things on top of it) or the whole thing moves when opening it. Overall, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine. I'd give it five stars
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine. I'd give it five stars, but the presets don't work all that well. The preset for "frozen entree" thaws the entree and leave it warm -- lukewarm. I suspect others may disappoint me also. OMG! Now a couple of months later the clock won't set. I have it 4; it deserves about 2. The plastic covering the control buttons is loose and wrinkled.
customer_reviews.author: Philip L. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Awful Microwave Oven!!
customer_reviews.text: It overheats and shuts down after less than 5 minutes on high ... not good for baked potatoes. It makes awful noises as well as if it's going to stop carousel revolving ... the pad is hard to use ... it's just overall a really bad microwave!!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: we love our microwave
customer_reviews.text: we love our microwave. It is a good size and power. we use it daily. we are happy with our purchase and do recommend it to others. great price and good machine.
customer_reviews.author: maureen christianson

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this microwave oven a few days ago. So far, so good. Easy to use, heats up well, the pull bar to open is a plus and the buttons are legible and easy to press.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to clean, but short-livedand worrisome
customer_reviews.text: This microwave was easy to keep clean, and easy to use. Unfortunately, if you expect your appliances to last, it wasn't a very good choice. After a little less than 3 years of use, the display began to flicker, and yesterday it stopped working. Unfortunately, it simultaneously caused the outlet it was plugged in to to char and smoke. Perhaps this oven should have been labelled, "for occasional use only."
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A. Mendina

customer_reviews.title: Microwave works fine but not happy about the panel bubbling
customer_reviews.text: The microwave works well but its the aesthetic of it that I'm not pleased with. I purchased this microwave only 6 months ago and about a month ago, I noticed that the panel has started to bubble. It makes the microwave look as though I've had it for years which I have not. Even though the microwave works great, I wouldn't purchase it again now that I know this is what you can expect after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Love the aesthetics.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaints are it should be able to 1 touch up to 6 minutes and the frame of the microwave likes to resonate. Works great and I'm NOT having the issue of button numbers fading out and the door latch breaking like my old microwaves.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Not a year old yet
customer_reviews.text: This microwave will be 1 year old August 11 (date of purchase) and the power level button does not work. I never used it until today (8/3) and it won't work. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a year with no problems. Good value
customer_reviews.author: Carl J Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Haven't even had it a year and the protectant on the numbers is starting to bubble. Also started making a loud noise. Would not purchase again. I updated my review to reflect that the noise has gotten much louder and is now screeching. I am so disappointed as we take such good care of it and it is falling apart in less than a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: NPerry

customer_reviews.title: Large interior and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Large interior and easy to use. It does often make a rattle/humming sound when it runs but for the price, I can deal with that. It does get a lot of use in our family of five - so maybe that is what caused the noise. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Beck

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for roughly 18 months and it acts like it’s going to catch fire... we have stopped using it because it acts like there is metal in it and has an electrical fire smell to it
customer_reviews.author: ryan morrow

customer_reviews.title: It works as expected and cooks nicely. I like the one touch settings and I've ...
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy a microwave from a brand that wasn't well known but so far I have no complaints. It works as expected and cooks nicely. I like the one touch settings and I've recommended it to others. The hOme brand is definitely an up and coming brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gullie Tha Hooligan

customer_reviews.title: It is very nice looking and has plenty of room for various cooking ...
customer_reviews.text: The microwave was needed for my daughters new home. It is very nice looking and has plenty of room for various cooking dishes. It has a glass rotary plate to help heat food evenly. I was jealous of the cooking functions and pre- programmed settings, since more than mine.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Gittemeier

customer_reviews.title: Not too large.  Love the pre-programmed buttons
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my office. The pre-programmed buttons work well. The defrost options work well for frozen foods. The putter colors match my coffee maker and it looks very chic. Not huge either so it doesn't take up a bunch of room on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Runs4Fun

customer_reviews.title: Caused an electrical fire
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine (esp for the price) for 15 months. Last week it started shorting at random intervals, and today I tried to microwave some food and the metal grate on the side of the machine (where the microwaves emit) caught on fire. Maybe it goes without saying, but I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I CAN MICROWAVE POPCORN!! WITHOUT BURNING IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this microwave. It came just in time before my other went out. It looks very modern and it works and cooks the food well. I LOVE THE FUNCTIONS. The heat function stops cooking the food once it is heated thoroughly. The popcorn function (which I never use on any microwave actually works!!)
customer_reviews.author: LaRenzo

customer_reviews.title: Won't Buy This Brand Again
customer_reviews.text: The display has gone bad, but the real problem was the loud pop and flash that emanated when I tried to heat something up. I then remembered I had bought the protection plan, which is actually pretty poor since it says I have to send it in and then I get reimbursed through an aGift card. What about my expense of getting a box, packing, and shipping? What about any sales tax?
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Solid little microwave oven
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little microwave oven. Nothing too fancy here, but it does an awesome job heating up all types of food evenly and completely. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Technotrooper

customer_reviews.title: Although the oven seems to be working fine (so far)
customer_reviews.text: Although the oven seems to be working fine (so far), it was very apparent that this was a returned item from someone else. The oven had fingerprints all over it and had been clearly repackaged (and poorly at that). It was also missing all documentation (instruction manual, warranty card, etc). The 4 feet pads on the bottom of the unit are not level so that it see-saws (which I corrected by adding a small shim to one of the feet). I suspect this may have been why it was returned in the first place. I suppose I should have returned it, but time is money . The path of least resistance was to just keep it and move along.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Crouch

customer_reviews.title: We're happy customers!
customer_reviews.text: I don't use many features, but my son has tried them all and said it works as it should. We're happy customers!
customer_reviews.author: H.R.

customer_reviews.title: The best microwave that you could ever buy top-rating excellent cook ...
customer_reviews.text: The best microwave that you could ever buy top-rating excellent cook your food perfect every time excellent quality or if the price I paid for I'm enjoying it everyday thank you so much have a blessed day goodbye
customer_reviews.author: sugar

customer_reviews.title: This microwave is fantastic deal at this price point
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is fantastic deal at this price point! It has all the necessary features and looks great while doing them!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J Rasche

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Product as described and shown in photos. Easy to set up. Easy to use. The +30 second function is very convenient. Thought the black would be too dark for our counter, but the stainless steel handle plus the blue screen make for an overall sleek appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted... 18 months...?
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed this microwave for the last year and a half... but now the little square on the inside starts sparking after 6 seconds of use making it now useless. Wished it lasted longer than 18 months...
customer_reviews.author: Will Leon

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient and a great size! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Microwave heats up food and drinks quicker than the microwaves I am used to. Very efficient and a great size! Highly recommend! Wish my boyfriend would let me get the rose gold looking one but still love the one we have!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Lasorda

customer_reviews.title: Works great - perfect for a dorm room
customer_reviews.text: Works great - perfect for a dorm room! And it looks sleeker than others around the same price point.
customer_reviews.author: BarnBeez

customer_reviews.title: Great Microwave!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this microwave a bit over a year now and it's still running strong. Easy to clean and use. The only downside is that it's very big. For a small apartment like mine, something smaller may be better.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Brill

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great fast powerful microwave for the price. I've had it about a month and I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but very loud, can hear it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but very loud, can hear it into the next room. May not have purchased if I knew how loud it is.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: I was very impressed with this mircowave. It cooks ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this mircowave. It cooks quickly and evenly. It is stylish and doesnt take up that much counter space. It is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rivers

customer_reviews.title: We live in a studio and it's not terribly noisy. Great price for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Makes my food hot. We live in a studio and it's not terribly noisy. Great price for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: ECK

customer_reviews.title: It suits our needs just fine!
customer_reviews.text: We use this as an office microwave and it works very well. Its heats things up very quickly and it doesn't run too loudly. It suits our needs just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Panthertown Investment Company

customer_reviews.title: Not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: We still hessle with the push button, not sensitive enough, and hard to see the number in the low light area, slippery bottom I need to put support rubber underneath, I choose this one base on the high review on Amazon ??
customer_reviews.author: bluestar329

customer_reviews.title: Died too soon
customer_reviews.text: This is a good microwave, although the labels are way too small. But it just died after 2 years of working well. Perhaps 2 years is considered a reasonable length of time? But to have to send such a large appliance to the landfill after just 2 years of use seems terribly wasteful. Have others had this problem with it? I will likely buy a different brand this time.
customer_reviews.author: karen berry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, elegant microwave and it works beautifully. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: bayda asbridge

customer_reviews.title: Household need
customer_reviews.text: Does all I expected it to do. Much more powerful than my previous microwave. All controls operate well. Good device
customer_reviews.author: Frank DeCrescenzo

product_meta.title: hOmeLabs Countertop Microwave Oven - 1.3 Cu. Ft., 1050W, Black with One-Touch Cook Functions, Dishwasher Safe Turntable and 10 Adjustable Power Settings
feature_bullets: COMPACT COUNTERTOP MICROWAVE OVEN - At 1.3 cubic feet, it fits perfectly in a small kitchen and has plenty of capacity for large plates or family sized meals. Has a slick black matte exterior and stainless steel handle to match any countertop space

QUICK TOUCH PIZZA COOKER and POPCORN MAKER - It has 10 power levels, 11 cooking functions and 7 easy pre-programmed settings for pizza, popcorn or steamed vegetables; defrost options by weight or time, and a speedy cook button for quick reheating

LARGE REVOLVING GLASS PLATE - Accessories include a BPA free rotating glass turntable plate to prevent hotspots and allow food to cook evenly. It can also easily be cleaned with a damp cloth or you can remove and place it inside the dishwasher

MEMORY and CHILD LOCK FEATURES - Memory feature for your favorite dishes; press a single button for delicious results every time. There's an interior light to monitor cooking progress, and a door with child lock to ensure safety for the kids at home

1050 WATT POWER with 6 QUART CAPACITY - Programming is quick and easy, and its LED display delivers a stylish, modern look. This 40 lb microwave measures 20.4" x 14.6" x 11.5" with a 6 qt capacity and internal dimensions of 13.25" x 13.25" x 9"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars593 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
